subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Lighthouses and Lightships
lead_paragraph: The Fastnet Rock, the turning point of the Fastnet race, is not an irresistible sight for every mariner, but many entrants let their gaze linger as they prepare to head back toward England and Plymouth.
snippet: The Fastnet Rock, the turning point of the Fastnet race, is not an irresistible sight for every mariner, but many entrants let their gaze linger as they prepare to head back toward England and Plymouth.
